item.title: Best practice on Disourse
item.dc:creator: jonobacon
item.description:
Nicolas:

What are your recommandation @jonobacon.

Great question, @Nicolas

I think what we are already starting to see is looking good. Great to see the development team collaborating out in the open on Discourse. This provides interesting insight for new MESG users to see how the sausage is made.

Some recommendations:

  • Topics don’t need to be archived. They are best left open (this will make it easy for people to search for them.)
  • I recommend you start publishing release notes regularly to the News category.
  • We should start promoting the community actively on social media and in @will’s content plan.
  • Can we start getting some HOWTOs and hacks into the HOWTO category?

Thanks,
